1.content:

I was sartinng to come to. Girls he awake hes awake the voice said. As my full i seen that i was on a big fat furry blue belly with a very fat fox and a tigger starinn at me with woriied eyes. ( You arelready know who they are from the intro so no need for guessing.) I said where am i. You are in our house you sexy arrtive beast Says renamon. Is this real or am i seeing things i said. No this is all real Says krysatl whoose belly you were still sitiing on. I started puncinng myslef and said okay this is all real. Just then tigrress picked me up in and me on the lips. O_o ok ause you are cutie says tigress. Just then i fainnted for a whille and when i awoke i was....
